thread.title: Endurance International Group Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Endurance International Group Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.05

organizations.name: reuters) - endurance international group holdings inc

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Endurance International Group Holdings Inc:
* ENDURANCE INTERNATIONAL GROUP REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 1 PERCENT TO $294.2 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 GAAP REVENUE OF $1.140 BILLION TO $1.160 BILLION
* ENDURANCE INTERNATIONAL GROUP HOLDINGS SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $310 MILLION TO $330 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.17 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $289.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
